data.comment: The big names in today's match at Arena Fonte Nova have now been confirmed.
The match has started, with Goianiense GO kicking-off.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 2, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Goianiense GO push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Dudu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bahia defence.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 7, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a Bahia throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 8, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards Bahia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
In the minute 10, Jadson for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Bahia.
Renato Kayzer (Goianiense GO) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Bahia are coming forward and Juninho Capixaba gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 16, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in Bahia.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO attack but Renato Kayzer's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 19, Bahia drives forward and Clayson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Dudu of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
In the minute 23, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bahia drive upfield and Rodriguinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
In the minute 24, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Janderson Santos de Souza (Goianiense GO) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 26, Goianiense GO's Joao Victor has been booked in Salvador.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards the away team a throw-in.
Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Nicolas Vichiatto's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards Bahia a goal kick.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Bahia.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In Salvador, Goianiense GO push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 32, Bahia push upfield but Vinicius Gomes do Amaral quickly pulls them for offside.
Edson for Goianiense GO drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Bahia's area.
In the minute 37, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goianiense GO are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Jean.
In the minute 41, Bahia are whistled for offside.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Bahia's half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Arena Fonte Nova.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
The first-half is over.
It's Bahia with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Attention is being given to Goianiense GO’s Edson and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 49, Goianiense GO's Edson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nicolas Vichiatto.
In the minute 55, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards the home team a throw-in.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 56, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rossi is on a sub for Clayson for Bahia.
In the minute 57, Bahia make their second substitution with Daniel replacing Jadson.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Nicolas Vichiatto for Goianiense GO is back on the field again.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 62, At Arena Fonte Nova, Bahia are penalized for being offside.
Bahia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 65, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Bahia.
Juninho of Bahia is pulled up for offside.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Play has been interrupted briefly in Salvador to check on Edson, who is grimacing with pain.
Goianiense GO’s Edson is on his feet again at Arena Fonte Nova.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nino Paraiba for Bahia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 70, Nino Paraiba has recovered and rejoins the match in Salvador.
Throw-in Bahia.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 72, Vagner Mancini is making the team's first substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Everton Felipe replacing Janderson Santos de Souza.
Matheus Vargas is replacing Chico for the away team.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
The home team replace Rodriguinho with Marco Antonio.
Nino Paraiba is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 74, Edson (Bahia) has replaced the possibly injured Nino Paraiba at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
The home team have replaced Gilberto with Saldanha. This is the fifth substitution made today by Claudio Prates.
In the minute 76, Bahia have a dangerous throw-in.
Jean is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goianiense GO’s Jean is on his feet again at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Goianiense GO.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In the minute 79, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Bahia's half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Salvador.
Hyuri is replacing Gustavo Ferrareis for the away team.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Daniel for Bahia has been booked by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 86, In Salvador, Daniel of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
In the minute 87, Free kick in a good position for Bahia!
Vagner Mancini (Goianiense GO) is making a fourth substitution, with Matheuzinho replacing Renato Kayzer.
Gilvan is replacing Nicolas Vichiatto for Goianiense GO at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bahia's Marco Antonio is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Goianiense GO.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards Bahia a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Salvador. The final score is 0-1.
At Arena Fonte Nova, Rossi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
At Arena Fonte Nova, Juninho is shown a red card and sent off.
